eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.weapons

Class CustomWeaponGlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.weapons.CustomWeaponGlider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomItem, CustomWeapon

    public class CustomWeaponGlider
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomWeapon
    A collection of methods for using the glider weapon.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • use

        public void use(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent event)
        Cancels the event of a feather interaction. Throws the player into the air, if they are sneaking. Otherwhise shoots a chicken, if it was a right click.
        Specified by:
        use in interface CustomItem
        Parameters:
        event - The interaction event.
        See Also:
        fly(Player), shoot(Player)

      • getCustomItemMaterials

        Specified by:
        getCustomItemMaterials in interface CustomItem
        Returns:
        The list of materials.

        Gets the lores to show on an instance of the custom weapon.

        Parameters:

      • shoot

        public static void shoot(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Shoots a chicken in the player's eye direction. The chicken explodes and spawns more chickens and AAAAAAAHHH!! Makes the glider loose 4 durability.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is shooting the chicken.
        See Also:
        Cooldown.playerProjectileShoot(Player), NmsEntityChickoon, spawnTemporaryChicken(Location, int), SkillUtils.createExplosion(Location, float), SkillUtils.callPlayerFixedDamageEvent(Player, Entity, double), DurabilityCalculator.damageItem(Player, ItemStack, int, boolean)

      • fly

        public static void fly(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Throws the player into the air and triggers gliding. Damages all entities inside a 2.5 block radius particle shape. Makes the glider loose 12 durability.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who starts to fly.
        See Also:
        Cooldown.playerProjectileShoot(Player), SkillUtils.throwEntityIntoAir(Entity, double), SkillUtils.callPlayerFixedDamageEvent(Player, Entity, double), DurabilityCalculator.damageItem(Player, ItemStack, int, boolean)

      • playChickenSounds

        private static void playChickenSounds(org.bukkit.Location origin)
        Plays three chicken sounds in different pitches at the same time.
        Parameters:
        origin - The location where the sounds should originate from.

      • glide

        public static void glide(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerMoveEvent event)
        Adds a chicken to the player's head, if it is not already there. Reduces the falling speed by 50% and lets the player slowly glide to their eye direction.
        Parameters:
        event - The move event.
        See Also:
        NmsEntityChickoon

      • dechick

        public static void dechick(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerMoveEvent event)
        Removes all chickens from the player's head.
        Parameters:
        event - The move event.

      • cancelFallDamage

        public static void cancelFallDamage(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent event)
        Cancels fall damage when holding a feather (glider) and makes it loose 2 durability. Also cancels suffocation damage for vehicle rides.
        Parameters:
        event - The damage event.
        See Also:
        DurabilityCalculator.damageItem(Player, ItemStack, int, boolean)

      • spawnTemporaryChicken

        private static org.bukkit.entity.Entity spawnTemporaryChicken(org.bukkit.Location location,
                                                              int duration)
        Spawns a temporary chicken, which will be removed after a given amount of ticks.
        Parameters:
        location - The location where the chicken should spawn.
        duration - The time in ticks till despawn.
        Returns:
        The temporary chicken entity.
        See Also:
        NmsEntityChickoon
